wikipedia_page.main: Mark Covell (born 7 November 1968) is a Scottish competitive sailor and Olympic medalist. He won a silver medal in the Star class at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, along with Ian Walker.He sailed with Team Russia as their media crew member for the 2008–09 Volvo Ocean Race.
